## Opal.open() method

Opens a database for a manifest.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
open(manifest: Manifest, options?: OpenOptions): Promise<Database>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  manifest | [Manifest](./opal.manifest.md) | the manifest of the database to open |
|  options | [OpenOptions](./opal.options.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> optional configuration for how to run the database |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Database](./opal.database.md)<!-- -->&gt;

the database instance for the given manifest

## Remarks

This method will throw an error if the database is already opened or being opened. Use [Opal.opened](./opal.opal.opened.md) to get opened databases.
